  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    net.sf.dynamicreports.report.constant.HorizontalAlignment
    use HorizontalTextAligment for texts or HorizontalImageAligment for images instead
    net.sf.dynamicreports.report.constant.VerticalAlignment
    use VerticalTextAligment for texts or VerticalImageAligment for images instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description

    Replaced by EXPORT_CONFIGURATION_OVERRIDE_REPORT_HINTS.
